name: No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protection Hair Oil

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Uncap bottle and turn it upside down..-Gently tap your index finger on bottom of bottle to dispense a metered drop..-Apply two to three drops to damp or dry hair, adding more as needed..-Style as normal..-For added shine and softness, apply a drop or two after styling..-Can be used daily on wet or dry hair or before styling with heat.

reviews.review_text: I have been through 3 of these bottles, each one last me about 6 months with me using it every day, I have curly hair so I use this product to crunch out my gel cast when my hair is dry to eliminate frizz
